events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got was different from what I paid for.
The customer's issue has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the request for money back.
The case has been assigned to a refund specialist to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Thanks for responding quickly. Here is my order number 458932 and I have attached a photo of the incorrect product I received.
We have confirmed the error and will process your refund immediately. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick resolution. I appreciate the prompt refund process and clear communication.
The refund has been finalized in our system. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We’re checking in to ensure you have received your refund safely. Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
Since the refund has been successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case now.
